data.title: Two Days of Salt in One Meal
data.text: Food was so salty I only ate it so I didn't waste my money.  Won't be going back.  Even if the food was good, I like real silverware, not plastic.  I gave up plastic cutlery when I was about 8 years old.

data.title: good bbq
data.text: it was clean and the people were friendly food was good sandwich's aren't real big but it was tasty. I would go again.

data.title: Tucky's BBQ - First Introduction, a sign on the side of a vehicle driving south on Boulder Hwy
data.text:
I ordered a two meat platter; brisket and rib tips with collard greens and baked beans.
The meal also included a corn bread muffin top.  The brisket was very tender and the rib tips fell apart with a fork.  Excellent BBQ selection on the east side of the valley; Boulder Hwy and Lake Mead Parkway.  5 star endorsement.

data.title: Great BBQ
data.text: Drove by on Boulder Hwy and this joint caught my eye. Looks like a converted defunk chain from the outside. Pleasant and clean on the inside with huge pine picnic tables. The menu is posted and polished, which makes me wonder if this is a chain too. Cashier lady was super friendly and patient with people who stand in line for a long time and can't decide what to order when they get to the window.  Had the chopped brisket sandwich with side of collard greens, both of which were still available at 7 pm on a Saturday night. Food takes awhile to be delivered which is OK but curious for a place where everything is pretty much pre-made. Topped with pickles and slaw. 3 different BBQ sauces available self-serve, all good, but I liked the "snappy" one. Served on a nice butter- topped bun.  The meal was delicious and no reason to deduct any stars, so 5 it is.  Would definitely return.

data.title: Good but not a great dining experience
data.text: We recently decided to try Tucky's since it is fairly close to our home. We ordered the BBQ for two which came with three meats (we chose fried bologna, pulled pork and ribs) . It also came with sides (Mac n cheese, cole slaw and potato salad). The meats were very tasty but it only came with two ribs, one each. I would think for the price they could give two each. Thankfully the ribs were very meaty. The sides were good with the exception of the Cole slaw which we didn't finish.  It was , as others said, a vinegar base. As I said, the food was good but I would suggest take out if you like your food in a comfortable surrounding . The only seating is picnic tables inside, no chairs with back support. While the food is worth a repeat visit, next time it will be take out.

data.title: Straight from the south BBQ! No need to travel further!
data.text: Tucky's opened several months ago and I've tried to get there since. My 1st trip will NOT be my last! I have had BBQ in Memphis, Texas, Virginia, etc and was more than surprised. The pulled pork is heavenly, the brisket tips are delish and the mac-n-cheese was out of this world. Marty and Gail traveled the south and really learned how to make great food. Dry or wet, you choose on the ribs. A side note- beef ribs available and they are insanely thick and tasty. Tropies on the wall indicate he knows BBQ. Check out the website, take out offered and large portion/catering available. Multiple award winners- Eat24/7, Yelp and others. Give it a try, you'll leave with a smile!

data.title: Not my kind of BBQ
data.text: Was so excited to have a local BBQ.  Unfortunately, this is not a style I like.  Too spicy.   Coleslaw has a very strong vinegar base.  I prefer it with a creamy base.  Service was good.  Venue clean and attractive.  Cobbler is excellent.

data.title: Very good food
data.text: The BBQ was very good. Pulled pork was very tender with great flavor. Ribs were great. They do take out that is a good value.

data.title: My previous review needs revision...
data.text: Brought my parents and husband... food only okay,  tried the baked beans-taste like they are from a can. When the gentleman took my order he was shaking his head.  As a customer, that's not a good feeling... that was after I stood at the counter in front of him for 2 minutes without being acknowledged at all. I asked for lean brisket, which is an option on the menu, and then my parents wanted their coleslaw on the side instead of on the sandwhich... evidently it was a big deal. This restaurant has promise,  but needs some finer touches.

data.title: Turkey's was a great surprise
data.text: After the search for BBQ lead me to the usual spots.  I was sent to Tuckey's and I was very happy.  A very friendly group of folks served me some of the finest ribs I have had in years.  Yes,  years.  The pulled chicken was moist and sweet.  The brisket was perfect.  You know that after BBQ salt taste.  Not at Tuckey's.  It's great.  I want ribs!

data.title: Sooooo good! Must stop!
data.text: Rib tips are amazing!!! My coworker wanted to try Tuckys,  so I had no idea what was coming. I really loved the burnt ends, corn bread and coleslaw! Coleslaw was fresh and colorful. Beans and mac were good too. This is a boulder highway gem. Don't even bother with the McDonald's next door, you would really be missing out!

data.title: Yum Yum Yum
data.text: New place - and a great addition to the neighborhood.  Tried the Smokehouse Salad and a beef brisket sandwich.  Both items were delicious.  Salad was so big (choices of pulled chicken, brisket, pulled pork to top the salad) that I could not finish it.    Although we didn't try the homemake cobbler, a friend told us it was delicious.

data.title: Best BBQ in our area of Henderson
data.text: If you order the loaded smoked spud -- hope you have 3 to 4 people with you. It's huge and delicious. The menu has variety from bologna and sausage to burnt ends and everything in between. I was not keen on the slaw. Maybe it was the dressing, but I won't order it again. For eating in or take out -- be patient. The service was slow, but it was worth the wait. We will be back. They also cater.

data.title: Heerlijk!
data.text: Hadden we dit restaurant maar in Nederland! Echt heerlijk vlees en erg vriendelijk personeel! Hier moet je echt naartoe wanneer je in de buurt bent!

data.title: ik kom terug!
data.text: toen wij er waren was het restaurant nog maar net een paar maand open, we werden hartelijk ontvangen door de eigenaar en zijn personeel. het eten is heerlijk langzaam gegaard wat de smaak ten goede komt. lekker en eerlijk puur vlees op je bord. volgende keer als ik in Las Vegas kom ga ik er weer heen.
